column2: Equinox Gold Corp. engages in the exploration of gold mining properties. The company is headquartered in Vancouver, British Columbia. The firm is engaged in the development and operation of mineral properties. The firm has a gold reserve base and operates three wholly owned gold mines. The firm is producing gold from its Aurizona Gold Mine in Brazil and its Mesquite Gold Mine in California. The firm also operates Castle Mountain Mine, which is located in San Bernardino County, California.
